column1: The esophagus is the tube that carries food from your mouth into the stomach.

Abnormal results may indicate: - A problem with the esophagus that affects its ability to move food toward the stomach (achalasia) - A weak LES, which causes heartburn (GERD) - Abnormal contractions of the esophagus muscles that do not effectively move food to the stomach (esophageal spasm)
